A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Honestly the movie was \"okay\". This was a fine movie but this was a terrible Star Wars movie. The number of plot holes between Episode 7 and Episode 8 was just too many to make this a well-thought out movie. Luke say \" I came here to die.\" yet he made a map and hid it. This entire movie seemed like a waste of time and money. If you want an episode 8 with good storytelling\, plot\, good acting and good light-saber duels\, GO WATCH the original trilogy or EVEN the prequels. Not impressed. The majority of this movie was very poor\, but it was a Star Wars movie. A true disappointment.
